thread.section_title: Forward Financing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Forward Financing | forwardfinancing.com
thread.title: Wayne

author: Wayne
title: Wayne
text:
Evan was great to work with Forward Financing was able to help us build our business when no other financing was available. When we were able to pay the remaining balance, they were willing to give us a pre-payment discount. We sent a wire transfer payment and the "ACH withdrawals stopped immediately. No games just honest business dealings is what you can expect from Forward Financing. That is true to the experience I have had.
Woody's Best Value
Wayne Woodhouse
